item.title: Building a Modern Developer Portfolio with Hugo and Blowfish
item.description: A guide to creating a powerful personal portfolio site using open-source technologies. In this article, I’ll explore what makes a great developer portfolio, which modern technologies can be used to build it, and the benefits of using Hugo with the Blowfish theme.
